tool.name: NetCDF xarray map plotting
tool.description: Visualize netCDF variables on a geographical map
tool.command: mkdir output_dir && HOME=`pwd` && mkdir -p `pwd`/mlp_tmpdir && MPLCONFIGDIR=`pwd`/mlp_tmpdir && echo "Galaxy xarray version @VERSION@" > output_dir/version.txt && python '$__tool_directory__/xarray_mapplot.py' '$input' '$var' #if $time_idx!="" --time="$time_idx" #end if --latitude="$lat_dim" --longitude="$lon_dim" #if $colorbar_label!="" --label="$colorbar_label" #end if #if $title!="" --title=$title #end if #if $cmap!="" --cmap="$cmap" #end if #if $proj!="" --proj="$proj" #end if #if $land!="" --land="$land" #end if #if $ocean!="" --ocean="$ocean" #end if #if $coastline!="" --coastline="$coastline" #end if #if $borders!="" --borders="$borders" #end if #if $threshold!="" --threshold="$threshold" #end if #if $range!="" --range="$range" #end if #if $xlim!="" --xlim="$xlim" #end if #if $ylim!="" --ylim="$ylim" #end if #if $shift!="" --shift #end if --verbose && mv *.png output_dir

param.label: Tabular of variables
param.name: var_tab
param.help: Select the tabular file which summarize the available variables and dimensions.

param.name: time_idx
param.label: List of time indices such as 0,1,... (optional)

param.name: xlim
param.label: longitudes values 'lonW,lonE' for limited geographical area (optional and only available with some projections)

param.name: ylim
param.label: latitudes values 'latS,latN' for limited geographical area (optional and only available with some projections)

param.name: range
param.label: Range of values for plotting e.g. minimum value abd maximum value (minval,maxval) (optional)

param.name: threshold
param.label: Do not plot values below this threshold (optional)

param.name: borders
param.label: Add country borders with alpha value [0-1] (optional)

param.name: cmap
param.label: Specify which colormap to use for plotting (optional)

param.name: proj
param.label: Specify the projection (proj4) on which we draw e.g. {'proj':'PlateCarree'} (optional)

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool extracts variable values with custom conditions on dimensions.
It can use manualy given coordinates or automaticaly take them from a tabular file to filter informations.
If no values are availables at a coordinate X, the tool will search the closest coordinate with a non NA value.
Filter can be set on every dimension. Available filtering operations are : =, >, <, >=, <=, [interval], ]interval[.
**Input**
A netcdf file (.nc).
Variable tabular file from 'Netcdf Metadate Info'.
Tabular file with coordinates (only coordinates, no header!) and the following structure : 'lat' 'lon'.
**Outputs**
A single output with values for the wanted variable if there is only one coordinate.
A data collection where one file is created for every coordinate, if multiple coordinates from tabular file.
-------------------------------------------------
The xarray select tool can be used after the xarray Info.
